sn38.8:4.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38.8:4.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38.8:4.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38.8:4.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.8:4.12: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38.8:4.13: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāya.
